rows.label: qev092403_MSG0001
rows.name: Ada told me about the thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0002
rows.name:
Hope went and renegotiated my work terms with my
boss just the other day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0003
rows.name:
And that's hardly the only thing I owe her for.
Whatever I can do to repay her, I will![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh, you're here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0005
rows.name:
I've got a likely piece of Whale wreckage
more or less pinpointed for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0006
rows.name: I suppose it's just never been a priority for the survey teams...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0007
rows.name:
Until yours truly tracked it down!
Totally worth pulling that all-nighter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0008
rows.name: Hello, Quentin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0009
rows.name: Are you helping out on this mission as well?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0010
rows.name:
Sure am! I'd do anything to help out
the guardian angel of New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0011
rows.name: Um, do you mean...me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_JNK0010
rows.name: Hush

rows.label: qev092403_SEL0011
rows.name: Remind Quentin of the confidentiality of this mission.

rows.label: qev092403_JNK0020
rows.name: Divert

rows.label: qev092403_SEL0021
rows.name:
Quickly ask Quentin how work
is going, to change the topic.

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0012
rows.name: Huh? ...Gah! I mean, of course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm always eager to help you,
no matter what mission you're on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0014
rows.name: That's all I meant. Hum de dum...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0015
rows.name:
Aw, that's sweet. Though I wish you'd
focus on yourself over helping me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0016
rows.name: Huh? You mean like at my job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0017
rows.name:
It's been much better since Hope
helped me renegotiate my contract![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh, really? I'm so glad! Hearing that makes it all worthwhile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0019
rows.name: Aw, thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0020
rows.name: So, about that database from the White Whale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0021
rows.name:
I talked to that weird Nopon who was here in New LA...
Lularita or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0022
rows.name: She said she'd go find it. I think she already took off, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0023
rows.name:
Could you maybe try to meet up with her
and see if she found anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0024
rows.name: Did Hope also help that Nopon, Lularita?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092403_MSG0025
rows.name:
Traveling all the way out to the caravans just
to help people... She really is an angel![ST:wait ]
